plot: In turn of the 20th century China, Chinese folk Wong Fei Hung faces many problems during the Chinese revolution, he continues to run his herbal clinic Po Chi Lum while facing many revolutionaries and martial arts opponents.
plot_en: In turn of the 20th century China, Chinese folk Wong Fei Hung faces many problems during the Chinese revolution, he continues to run his herbal clinic Po Chi Lum while facing many revolutionaries and martial arts opponents.
plot_es: In turn of the 20th century China, Chinese folk Wong Fei Hung faces many problems during the Chinese revolution, he continues to run his herbal clinic Po Chi Lum while facing many revolutionaries and martial arts opponents.
title: Wong Fei Hung
